scripts.build: npm run build:component && npm run build:data-handling && npm run build:app
scripts.build:component: cd taxonium_component && npm install && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" npm run build
scripts.prod: npm run start-backend-prod & npm run serve
scripts.prod-custom: npm run start-backend-custom & npm run serve
scripts.dev-with-backend: npm run start-backend & npm run dev
scripts.rebuild-component: cd taxonium_component && npm run build && echo 'Component rebuilt! Refresh your browser.'
scripts.watch-component: cd taxonium_component && npm run build && echo 'Component rebuilt! Starting watch mode...' && chokidar 'src/**/*' -c 'npm run build && echo Component rebuilt at $(date)'
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && cd taxonium_component && rm -rf dist
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd taxonium_component && npm install && cd ../taxonium_data_handling && npm install && cd ../taxonium_backend && npm install
